word: H8626 - תָּקַן - tâqan - taw-kan' - Set in order

sections.paragraph: to equalize, to make straight, to become straight
b) (Piel) to make straight, to put straight, to arrange in order, to set in or der
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to equalize, that is, straighten (intransitively or transitively); figuratively to compose: - set in order, make straight.
